integration_patterns: FHIR APIs for health data exchange

evidence.claim: TenPoint7 utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure.
The company implements FHIR for healthcare data interoperability.
They employ Snowflake for data management and analytics.
TenPoint7 supports X12 transaction sets for electronic data interchange.
Kafka is used for real-time data streaming in their architecture.

icp.icp_reason: Offers EDI integration and uses X12 for healthcare data exchange, targeting providers and payers.
matched_use_cases: Data exchange with healthcare providers using FHIR APIs
